participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, Alex loves to explore different forms of art and culture.
participant_1.background: I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to. I enjoy going to museums. I am wiccan, but haven’t told them. I like to smell my own farts. I spend a good deal of time on social media.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Introspective yet lively, Jordan is always seeking deeper connections with the world around her.
participant_2.background: I don't feel fulfilled in my life and need to express myself more. I love my laptop because it keeps me connected to the world when I'm on the go. I am a night owl. My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am. I love to dress up but it's not all about the look, I like to keep my feet on the ground.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of museums, how about you?
I love museums! I think they're so fascinating. I love learning about history and culture.
Me too! I especially love art museums. I love looking at all the different paintings and sculptures.
I love art museums too! I'm not really an artist myself, but I love appreciating other people's work.
Have you been to any museums lately?
I went to the Met last weekend. It was amazing! I could have spent all day there.
The Met is awesome! I've been there a few times. I love the Egyptian exhibit.
I loved the Egyptian exhibit too! I also loved the modern art section.
Me too! I love all the different kinds of art they have there.
I'm so glad we agree! I love talking about museums
